name: Runes (itch) (Cannibal Cat Software)
description:
Runes is a puzzle game in the style of Columns. Play a quick game in Classic mode and see how high you can climb, or jump into Adventure mode for a series of increasingly challenging levels with varying objectives.

Available for Sega Genesis/Mega Drive. Load the game into your favorite emulator, or onto an EverDrive cart for the full experience.

HOW TO PLAY

Use the Directional Buttons to move the runes.

Press the A Button to shift the order of the runes.

Match 3 or more runes vertically, horizontally, or diagonally to score.

The flashing Wyrd Rune captures all runes matching the color beneath it.

If you place any runes past the top of the board, game over!

ADVENTURE MODE

In Adventure mode, press Start to view your inventory.

GOLDEN APPLE: Extra life

GJALLARHORN: Clear runes

KNOT OF LOKI: Shuffle runes

THREAD OF NORNS: Extra time

WYRD RUNE: Summon Wyrd Rune
